00017 package srgcwscs;

00019 import java.io.File;
00020 import java.util.ArrayList;
00021 
00041 public class srgcwscsTester 
00042 {
00051     public static void main(String[] args) 
00052     {
00053         //System.out.println("****  WELCOME TO THIS PROGRAM  ****");
00054         long programStart = ElapsedTime.systemTime();
00055 
00056         // 1. Get the list of tests to run (test = instanceName + testParameters)
00057         //String testsFilePath = "inputs" + File.separator + "testToRun.txt";// inputs/tets2run.txt
00058         String testsFilePath = "inputs" + File.separator + "Test2Run.txt";
00059         TestsPlanner planner = new TestsPlanner(testsFilePath);
00060         ArrayList<Test> testsList = planner.getTestsList();
00061 
00062         // 2. For each test (instanceName + testParameters) in the list...
00063         int nTests = testsList.size();
00064         for (int k = 0; k < nTests; k++) 
00065         {
00066             Test aTest = testsList.get(k);
00067           // System.out.println("\n# STARTING TEST " + (k + 1) + " OF " + nTests);
00068             long testStart = ElapsedTime.systemTime();
00069 
00070             // 2.1.1 Get the instance inputs (nodes data)and the vcap inputs .
00071             String inputsFilePath = "inputs" + File.separator + aTest.getInstanceName() + "_input_nodes.txt";
00072             // MARCOS normal instances String inputsVehicleFilePath = "inputs" + File.separator + "vehicles.txt";
00073             // MARCOS KELLY INSTANCES
00074             String inputsVehicleFilePath = "inputs" + File.separator + "kellyVehicles" + File.separator + aTest.getInstanceName();
00075             InputsManager inMngr = new InputsManager(inputsFilePath,inputsVehicleFilePath);
00076             Inputs inputs = inMngr.getInputs();
00077             // 2.1.2 Get the vcap inputs
00078 
00079 
00080             // 2.2. Use the SR-GCWS-CS algorithm to solve the instance
00081             SRGCWSCS algorithm = new SRGCWSCS(aTest, inputs);
00082             Outputs output = algorithm.solveInTime();
00083             //2.3. Print out the results to a file with local output
00084             String outputsFilePath = "outputs" + File.separator
00085                     + aTest.getInstanceName() + "_" + aTest.getSeed() + "_outputs.txt";
00086             output.sendToFile(outputsFilePath);
00087 
00088          
00089             //2.4. End of current test
00090              long testEnd = ElapsedTime.systemTime();
00091         }
00092     }
00093 }
